title: Get a migration subtask
description: Get the details of a specific migration subtask from the BigQuery Migration API.

objective.narrative: When managing a database migration with the BigQuery Migration API, a developer might need to check the state of an individual step. This sample retrieves a single migration subtask resource so the developer can examine its properties, such as task type, state, and any error messages.

regionTags.name: bigquerymigration_v2alpha_migrationservice_migrationsubtask_get
regionTags.title: Get a migration subtask
regionTags.description: Get the details of a specific migration subtask from the BigQuery Migration API.
